sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Tricks">a8c6c0be1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbef</category> <github_id>121</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/121</github_url> <message>If you have a password policy defined, you can use the following to generate strong passwords. ```javascript gs.info(new SNC.PasswordGenerator('415b8a892f2b815051dad5f62799b67a').generate()); gs.info(new SNC.PasswordGenerator().generate()); ```  **NOTE:** Password policy sysid is optional. The function still returns a random password if you dont pass the password policy id. </message> <number>TIL0001128</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-05-17 08:14:34</sys_created_on> <sys_id>dfbc0ac92f2b815051dad5f62799b637</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-05-20 07:09:22</sys_updated_on> <title>Generate strong passwords</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
